question: Who among the following is known to have founded the "Academic Association"?
explanation: The Academic Association was established in 1828. Henry Louis Vivian Derozio was the president of the organization. It was settled in Maniktala, Kolkata. Discussion on Free will, free ordination, fate, faith, the sacredness of truth were practiced by the members. Some notable members of the assoiation are Rasik Krishna Mallick, Krishna Mohan Banerjee, Radhanath Sikdar, Dakshinaranjan Mukherjee.
